name: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Change a letter in HAIR to get a word meaning someone who inherits something from someone.
Now change a letter to make a word meaning to listen to something.
Now change a letter to get word following grizzly, panda, or koala.
Now change a letter meaning to hit, or to win against somebody.
Now change a letter to make a word meaning curved.
Now change a letter to make a word meaning departed, or exited.
Change a letter to make a word that means you wish you had something.
Now change a letter to get a word for the stick a wizard uses.
Change a letter to get a stripe or a group of musicians.
Finally, change a letter to get a word that means having no hair on your head.
